articles.title: Harris, Beyoncé team up for a Texas rally on abortion rights and hope battleground states hear them - The Associated Press
articles.description: Beyoncé has told a packed stadium that it's time for America to elect Kamala Harris president, imploring voters: “We need you. It’s time to sing a new song." The vice president was delivering a message Friday to battleground voters all the way from reliably R…
articles.content: HOUSTON (AP) Beyoncé told a packed stadium on Friday that it was time for America to elect Kamala Harris president, urging voters to sing a new song, before the vice president delivered a message to … [+7142 chars]

articles.author: Dana Hedgpeth, Sari Horwitz, Toluse Olorunnipa
articles.title: ‘I formally apologize’: Biden condemns U.S. Indian boarding schools - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Joe Biden apologized to Native Americans on Friday for the U.S. government’s role in taking Native children from their families and cultures.
articles.content: GILA RIVER INDIAN COMMUNITY President Joe Biden apologized to Native Americans on Friday for the U.S. governments role in creating and operating Indian boarding schools that for 150 years aimed to as… [+268 chars]
